item.description:
TPLEASE NOTE LOCATION FOR THIS MEETUP: 135 Sheridan Street on Munjoy Hill - Patrick and Deena's place.

This week we will be watching Eckhart Tolle's Findhorn Retreat, filmed in 2004 at one of the world's largest and oldest intentional communities in Scotland. This is a four hour series which we will be watching in three sittings. We will schedule some time for discussion and a short meditation afterwards, and will try to wrap up by 8:30pm. If you enjoy Eckhart Tolle and his message, or have heard of his "Power of Now" philosophy and want to know more, this is an enlightening talk.

Please join us in mindful community as we seek to bring more awareness, wisdom and compassion into our lives and into the world.
item.name: Eckhart Tolle, Part 3
